title: My Game is not opening!!!
body:
Hi,
I need some help, currently my game has not been opening it has just been coming up with the white rectangle then loading circle and then it closes.
I am really hoping that one of you could help me. Just so you know I have already tried re installing the game but it isn't working. 
Thanks.

replies.body:
MAC 

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3400854#37316170

This is the one I used when my client didn't work.
